java.lang.Object

      com.percussion.extensions.general.PSSimpleJavaUdf_replace
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPSExtension, IPSFieldInputTransformer, IPSUdfProcessor
public class PSSimpleJavaUdf_replace
extends PSSimpleJavaUdfExtension
implements IPSFieldInputTransformer

The PSSimpleJavaUdf_replace class replaces strings given by a user defined function (UDF).

PSSimpleJavaUdf_replace

Method Detail

processUdf

public Object processUdf(Object[] params,
                         IPSRequestContext request)
                  throws PSConversionException
Replaces every occurrence of params[1] in params[0] with the string in params[2].

Specified by:
processUdf in interface IPSUdfProcessor
Parameters:
params - the parameter values to use in the UDF
request - the current request context
Returns:
The string after the substitution has been completed. If params[1] or params[2] is null, params[0] is returned w/o modification.
Throws:
PSConversionException - if params[0] is null or more than 3 argument are supplied.
